title: Quaint and nice
text: I stayed at the Allerton for Valentine's day weekend 09'. I must say it was a very nice hotel. Although small, staff was very friendly and accomodating. We originally booked a; I believe they refer to it as a "mini" room.. (dont quote me) but they upgraded us free of charge to a normal size king bedroom. The hotel is located in a GREAT location! Michigan Ave. Shoppers paradise. Nice restaurant, nice staff, nice room service. reasonable price for a short notice trip.. (booked with orbitz.com) Would stay here again, would reccomend.
